title: Death of a Player
description: A small New Hampshire tennis club is devastated when the body of one of it's favorite members is found lifeless in the locker room. Private Investigator Mena Young is called in to consult with the Lake Pleasant Police Department to find the killer.  Death of a Player unveils the mystery surrounding the murder victim along with Mena's traumatic past to give a glimpse into life in a small country town. Things are rarely what they seem.
author: Alex Ashe
